title: Practice Location
description: Treating a wide range of health related issues, quit smoking, lose weight, pain management, digestion, women's health, asthma & allergies. Located in 792 Pompton Avenue Cedar Grove, NJ - Margaret Amireh, Dipl. Ac., C.A., B.S.
cleaned_text: New Jersey Acupuncture Clinic Acupuncture is a complementary medicine that helps a myriad of ailments including: digestive, respiratory and circulatory disorders, acute and chronic pain, allergies, headaches, anxiety, and stress. It is internationally recognized by the World Health Organization (WHO) as well as the National Institute of Health as an effective form of medicine. Dr. Margaret Amireh, DACM, L.Ac is an accredited and board certified Acupuncturist with experience treating over 250 conditions. Margaret provides gentle, effective relief to patients throughout the Cedar Grove, New Jersey area. Margaret has tremendous compassion and concern for all her patients, and has significantly impacted many of their lives. With the help of Margaret, countless patients are now enjoying more active, pain-free, healthy, and productive lifestyles. Acupuncture is covered by many insurance plans including: Horizon Blue Cross Blue Shield, CIGNA, Aetna, United Healthcare, and many more. We are in-network with Horizon Blue Cross Blue Shield, Aetna, CIGNA, United Healthcare, Magnacare, and Qualcare. Call our office today for a complimentary benefits check to see if acupuncture is a covered benefit on your plan.
